languages.text: {n}Торбальд смущенно взирает на вас.{/n} "Слова эти не лживы. Первое, что поручил нам инквизитор в Просторе, было изничтожение секты техноеретиков. Сие было исполнено. Этот Амарнат был добрым жрецом? Калькасар втянул нас в нечистое дело?"

{n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд смущенно взирает на вас.{/n} "Слова эти не лживы. Первое, что поручил нам инквизитор в Просторе, было изничтожение секты техноеретиков. Сие было исполнено. Этот Амарнат был добрым жрецом? Калькасар втянул нас в нечистое дело?"

traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}索巴德羞愧地看了你一眼。{/n}“她说的都是实话。大审判官交给我们的第一个任务，就是要求我们摧毁某个科技异端邪教组织，我们完成了任务。莫非这个阿玛纳特是位善良的神甫吗？难道卡尔卡扎把我们卷入了某种邪恶的阴谋之中？”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德羞愧地看了你一眼。{/n}“她说的都是实话。审判长交给我们的第一个任务，就是要求我们摧毁某个科技异端邪教组织，我们完成了任务。莫非这个阿玛纳特是位善良的祭司吗？难道卡尔卡扎把我们卷入了某种邪恶的阴谋之中？”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald vous lance un regard honteux.{/n} « Elle dit la vérité. La première mission que nous a confiée l'inquisiteur dans les Étendues, c'était d'anéantir un culte de technohérétiques. Et c'est ce que nous avons fait. Cet Amarnat... C'était un bon prêtre ? Calcazar nous aurait-il poussés à commettre un acte ignoble ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald vous lance un regard honteux.{/n} « Elle dit la vérité. La première mission que nous a confiée l'inquisiteur dans les Étendues, c'était d'anéantir un culte de technohérétiques. Et c'est ce que nous avons fait. Cet Amarnat... C'était un bon prêtre ? Calcazar nous aurait-il poussés à commettre un acte ignoble ? »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは恥ずかしそうにこちらを見た。{/n}「彼女が言っていることは本当だ。異端審問官がエクスパンスで我々に与えた最初の任務は、技術異端者のカルト教団を壊滅させることだった。任務は完了した。このアマルナトとやらは善良な良い司祭だったのか？カルカサルは俺たちをやましいことに引きずり込んだのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは恥ずかしそうにこちらを見た。{/n}「彼女が言っていることは本当だ。異端審問官がエクスパンスで我々に与えた最初の任務は、技術異端者のカルト教団を壊滅させることだった。任務は完了した。このアマルナトとやらは善良な良い司祭だったのか？カルカサルは俺たちをやましいことに引きずり込んだのか？」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald te mira con vergüenza.{/n} «Dice la verdad. La primera tarea que nos encomendó el Inquisidor al llegar a la Extensión fue destruir un culto de tecnoherejes. Y eso hicimos. El tal Amarnat... ¿era buen sacerdote? ¿Nos arrastró Calcazar a cometer fechorías?».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald te mira con vergüenza.{/n} Dice la verdad. La primera tarea que nos encomendó el Inquisidor al llegar a la Extensión fue destruir un culto de tecnoherejes. Y eso hicimos. El tal Amarnat... ¿era buen sacerdote? ¿Nos arrastró Calcazar a cometer fechorías?».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald blickt dich beschämt an.{/n} "Sie lügt nicht. Die erste Aufgabe, die der Inquisitor uns in der Ausdehnung gegeben hat, war die Vernichtung eines Kults von Tech-Ketzern. Es wurde vollbracht. Dieser Amarnat, war er ein guter Priester? Hat Calcazar uns in etwas Schändliches hineingezogen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald blickt dich beschämt an.{/n} "Sie lügt nicht. Die erste Aufgabe, die der Inquisitor uns in der Ausdehnung gegeben hat, war die Vernichtung eines Kults von Tech-Ketzern. Es wurde vollbracht. Dieser Amarnat, war er ein guter Priester? Hat Calcazar uns in etwas Schändliches hineingezogen?"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, utanç içinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Doğruyu söylüyor. Engizisyoncu'nun bize Enginlik'te verdiği ilk görev, bir tekno kâfir tarikatını ortadan kaldırmaktı. Görevimizi yerine getirdik. Amarnat denen şu herif... İyi bir rahip miydi? Calcazar'ın oyununa mı geldik?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald glances at you in shame.{/n} "She speaks no lies. The first task the Inquisitor gave us in the Expanse was to destroy a cult of tech-heretics. The deed was done. This Amarnat, was he a good priest? Did Calcazar drag us into something foul?"
